gameDescription: The idea of the game is simple: when the game begins, the mobile device is passed to each player, and all players are shown one word, except for one player who gets a different word. The players try to find out who the spy is, and the spy tries to blend in with them and not raise suspicion.
classicModeDescription: In this mode, the spy sees 'You are the spy,' so they know they are the spy and try to blend in.
blindModeDescription: In this mode, the spy sees a different word from the rest. No one knows whether they are the spy or not.
noNameValidate: You cannot add an empty player name (:
nowYouCanAskOrVote: Now you can vote or ask again
wordRevealText: Press 'Show' to see the word, and don't let anyone else see it
